abstract: Forget the speculation. Dell has been advertising its showdown with Apple all along.
snippet: Forget the speculation. Dell has been advertising its showdown with Apple all along.
lead_paragraph: CLARIFICATION 5:55 p.m. – The story below references a Dell ad placed in UptownLife magazine. The online version of that ad, which has since been removed, appeared to include both an image from Dell and text. A Dell spokesman, Bob Kaufman, said that Dell was only confirming the “Adamo by Dell” image and not the text, which is quoted in this post.

headline.main: Dell’s MacBook Air Rival Confirmed by . . . Dell
